Key Match Events: Jhonkensy Noel's home run attempt was caught by Alex Verdugo for the second out of the inning.
Emmanuel Clase allowed two runs in the top of the ninth.
David Fry's infield single was misplayed by Mark Leiter Jr. and allowed Bo Naylor to score from third.
Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians have made a habit of fighting back all year long.
The team leading 3-1 after four games in a best-of-seven postseason series has gone on to win the series 79 of 93 times.
Post-Match Reflections: Guardians manager Stephen Vogt said the team will show up ready to win in Game 5.
Catcher Austin Hedges said the team believes in each other and just needs to win one game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees know better than to look ahead to a potential World Series.
The Guardians also faced elimination in the AL Division Series against the Tigers before prevailing in five games.
Others: The series is now at 3-1 in favor of the Yankees, with the Guardians facing elimination in Game 5 on Saturday.
